languages.text: "Святость храма заключена не в высоте его сводов, но в щедрости жертв, возносимых в нем".
languages.translation_comment: Abelard: "I am forever astonished that Reverend Hieronymus makes do with that shoebox of a chapel in the Atrium for his sermons. Footfall has several temples far more befitting his status."

languages.text: "The holiness of the temple does not lie in the height of its vaults, but in the generosity of the sacrifices offered in it."
languages.original_text: "Святость храма заключена не в высоте его сводов, но в щедрости жертв, возносимых в нем".

languages.text: "Die Heiligkeit eines Tempels hängt nicht von der Höhe seiner Gewölbe ab, sondern von der Großzügigkeit der Opfer, die darin erbracht werden."
languages.original_text: "The holiness of the temple does not lie in the height of its vaults, but in the generosity of the sacrifices offered in it."

traits.locale_text: "Die Heiligkeit eines Tempels hängt nicht von der Höhe seiner Gewölbe ab, sondern von der Großzügigkeit der Opfer, die darin erbracht werden."

languages.text: « La sainteté du temple ne réside pas dans la hauteur de ses murs, mais dans la générosité des sacrifices consentis en son sein. »
languages.original_text: "The holiness of the temple does not lie in the height of its vaults, but in the generosity of the sacrifices offered in it."

traits.locale_text: « La sainteté du temple ne réside pas dans la hauteur de ses murs, mais dans la générosité des sacrifices consentis en son sein. »

languages.text: «La santidad del templo no depende de la altura de sus bóvedas, sino de la generosidad de los sacrificios ofrecidos».
languages.original_text: "The holiness of the temple does not lie in the height of its vaults, but in the generosity of the sacrifices offered in it."

traits.locale_text: «La santidad de un templo no depende de la altura de sus bóvedas, sino de la generosidad de los sacrificios ofrecidos».

languages.text: 「神殿の神聖さは、その丸天井の高さにあるのではなく、そこで捧げられる犠牲の寛大さにある」
languages.original_text: "The holiness of the temple does not lie in the height of its vaults, but in the generosity of the sacrifices offered in it."

traits.locale_text: 「神殿の神聖さは、その丸天井の高さにあるのではなく、そこで捧げられる犠牲の寛大さにある」

languages.text: “圣殿的神圣之处并不在于拱顶有多高，而是在于祭品有多么慷慨。”
languages.original_text: "The holiness of the temple does not lie in the height of its vaults, but in the generosity of the sacrifices offered in it."

traits.locale_text: “圣殿的神圣之处并不在于拱顶有多高，而是在于祭品有多么慷慨。”

languages.text: "Tapınağın kutsallığı, mahzenlerinin yüksekliğinden gelmez. Bu mahzenlerde edilen kurbanların bolluğundan gelir."
languages.original_text: "The holiness of the temple does not lie in the height of its vaults, but in the generosity of the sacrifices offered in it."
